Site-visit to SK Pendidikan Khas Johor Bahru
============================================

by [attpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/attpic/ "Posts by attpic")
 | Jan 18, 2017 | [ATT](https://fke.utm.my/category/att/)

Our members, Assoc Prof. Dr Sharifah Hafizah have site-visited Sekolah Kebangsaan Pendidikan Khas Johor Bahru. The school is loacted at JKR 5739, Jln Pahlawan 17, Taman Ungku Tun Aminah, Skudai.

The purpose of the visit is to discuss their problems and present some ideas on how to solve those problems. This is the first step for this project, in order to clarify the main problems and to collect information on the target location for the project implementation.
